Subject : Exemption from pre-embarkation security checks at Civil Airports. 
 
In supersession of this Bureau Circular No 07/2007 dated 05.06.2007,  it has been decided that 
the following VVIPs / VIPs and  their accompanying spouse are exempted from pre-embarkation 
security checks at all civil airports in the country. 
 
1. 
President 
2. 
Vice President 
3. 
Prime Minister 
4. 
Former Presidents 
5. 
Former Vice-President  
6. 
Speaker of Lok Sabha 
7. 
Chief Justice of India 
8. 
Judges of Supreme Court   
9. 
Leader of Opposition in Lok Sabha & Rajya Sabha 
10. 
Union Ministers of Cabinet rank  
11. 
Deputy Chairman Rajya Sabha & Deputy Speaker Lok  Sabha 
12. 
Governors of States 
13. 
Chief Ministers of States 
14. 
Minister of State of the Union Council of Ministers 
15. 
Chief Justices of the High Courts 
16. 
Lt. Governors of Union Territories 
17. 
Chief Ministers of  Union Territories 
18. 
Deputy Chief Ministers of States 
19. 
Deputy Chief Ministers of Union Territories 
20. 
Ambassadors of foreign countries, Charge D’ Affairs and High Commissioners and 
their spouses 
21. 
Cabinet Secretary 
22. 
Visiting Foreign dignitaries of the same status as at Sl. Nos. 1 to 3,6,7,10 & 12 
above 
23. 
His Holiness the Dalai Lama 
24. 
SPG Protectees 
25. 
Shri Robert Vadra, while travelling with SPG Protectees. 
 
2. 
It is reiterated that except the categories specified above, all other categories of 
passengers, traveling by air through the civilian airports in the country, are to be subjected to 
pre-embarkation  security checks without making any exception in any particular case. 
 
(M.Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA)
